products.title: Splash Tropez Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Tropez Grey 89mm Vertical Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £9.60 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Tropez has an elegant grey/brown hue, with its rich earthy tones it will compliment a vast range of interior colour palettes. Our vertical blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe. As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which provides extra peace of mind that you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.
 
 Product ID: SDB-VTB1476 Fabric Colour: Tropez Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Slimline Headrail Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top or Face Fixable     Slat Width: 89mm Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation with Cord tilt OR Wand Tilt and Pull Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Pebble Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Pebble Grey 89mm Vertical Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £9.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A family favourite, our Splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds.  Splash Pebble Grey is a on-trend light grey vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home.  This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this grey vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant! Our quality made to measure vertical blinds are a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting TV drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), our vertical blinds are great for privacy and light control.Coming with sleek white components and quality-checked by our blind experts, quality is paramount.  At Swift Direct Blinds with over 50 years making and selling blinds under our belt, not only is this vertical blind made by the experts,  it also comes with a fabulous five year guarantee - extra assurance that you are investing in quality that will stand the test of time.
 
 Product ID: SDB-VTB1328 Fabric Colour: Pebble Grey Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Slimline Headrail Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top or Face Fixable     Slat Width: 89mm Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation with Clear Tilt Wand or Wand Tilt and Pull Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.metadescription: Splash Dark Grey 89mm Vertical Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £9.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary.  Splash Dark Grey vertical blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  With a variety of control and stacking options available on our headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window.  As this is one of our made to measure products, a 5 year guarantee is also included when purchasing this blind, giving extra assurance that you are investing in piece that will stand the test of time.

Our moisture-resistant Splash Mid Grey vertical blinds are contemporary and stylish, the mid grey fabric is a beautiful cool grey colour.  This will work well with most colour palettes within the home or office.  With a variety of control and stacking options available on our headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window, especially kitchen or bathroom windows. As this is one of our made to measure products, a 5 year guarantee is also included when purchasing this blind, giving extra assurance that you are investing in piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Maylar
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Maylar Budget Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Budget Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 4115mm
 	Min Drop: 200mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open and close the blind, beaded chain to tilt louvres. Controls can be positioned on the left or right.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
